abstract: Cisco’s coming server product could stand as the first of a new type of computer system that forces customers to rethink their data centers.
snippet: Cisco’s coming server product could stand as the first of a new type of computer system that forces customers to rethink their data centers.
lead_paragraph: People who purchase data center equipment should pay close attention to Cisco Systems’ new server product. Cisco’s industry-rattling move portends great change for the ways in which hardware and software arrive at businesses.

headline.main: And So Begins the Next Mainframe Saga
